snippet: Seven Iranian aid workers were abducted Tuesday by an unknown armed group in the eastern city of Benghazi.
abstract: Seven Iranian aid workers are abducted by an unknown armed group in the Libyan city of Benghazi; incident is the biggest of its kind against foreigners since the start of the country's revolt.
lead_paragraph: Seven Iranian aid workers were abducted Tuesday by an unknown armed group in the eastern city of Benghazi.

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
keywords.name: subject
